attributes.action: take faster and more positive actions towards reducing carbon emissions in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a lot of talk amongst politicians world wide abot how to reduce carbon emissions. However, the progress is painfully slow, and the targets are nowhere near great enough to create the reduction needed to prevent worldwide catastrophy. We the below prepose that actions such as the banning of non-energy efficient lightbulbs, prevention of shops and busniesses leaving lighting running overnight, and a far greater investment in renewable energy sources (for example, wind turbine farms off the coasts) need to taken, and quickly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
